attributes.action: Prevent the Post Office from managing an investigation into its own actions.
attributes.additional_details: It goes against the principles of independence and judicial fairness that the Post Office can investigate itself.
attributes.background: Create an  investigation in which the Post Office has no management function at all.

rejection.details:
The Post Office Horizon IT Inquiry is an independent public statutory Inquiry established by the Government to gather a clear account of the implementation and failings of the Horizon IT system at the Post Office over its lifetime. You can find out more about this inquiry here: https://www.postofficehorizoninquiry.org.uk/about-inquiry

If you are concerned about the Post Office's role in providing compensation for postmasters, we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Remove Post Office from process of compensating postmasters: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654500
